record.description: Sophomores Marjorie Kraus (left) and Jeanette Davison achieve ideal harmony of costume with lumberjack shirts, tails of which may be tucked inside jeans or left hanging sloppily outside. Note their pigtail hair-dos. Scene is in Mandel Hall Coffee Shop, busy after-class rendezvous site.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Archives stamp. 1951 stamp refers to the reuse of picture and article about what happened to the two women in the photo after nine years.
